org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer

Class BeanTupleQueryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer.BeanTupleQueryView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeListener, Serializable, org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.QueryView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CriteriaQueryView

    public class BeanTupleQueryView
extends Object
implements org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.QueryView, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeListener
    Wrapper around the LazyQueryView. For some reason, LazyQueryView was defined as final.
    Author:
    jflamy
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • BeanTupleQueryView

        public BeanTupleQueryView(BeanTupleQueryDefinition queryDefinition,
                  BeanTupleQueryFactory queryFactory)
        Constructs LazyQueryView with given QueryDefinition and QueryFactory. The role of this constructor is to enable use of custom QueryDefinition implementations.
        Parameters:
        queryDefinition - The QueryDefinition to be used.
        queryFactory - The QueryFactory to be used.
